summary: After seven years went by, Gohan grows up during the time around Goten's birth. Goku died and when Goten cries, Broly regains life and the Z warriors must stop him again.
cast: Masako Nozawa|Mayumi Tanaka|Takeshi Kusao|Yûko Minaguchi|Junko Shimakata|Chafûrin|Hisao Egawa|Yoshiyuki Kôno|Asuka Kimura|Bin Shimada|Hitoshi Takagi|Jôji Yanami|Vic Mignogna|Kyle Hebert|Kara Edwards|Laura Bailey|Sean Schemmel|Stephanie Nadolny|Cynthia Cranz|Sonny Strait|Monica Rial|Grant James|R. Bruce Elliott|Robert McCollum|Adrian Cook|Sean Teague|Michael Terry|Jeremy Inman|Travis Willingham|Ahmad Khafe|Grace Roiyo
keywords: supernatural power|based on comic book|villian|song during end credits|giving the finger
title: Dragon Ball Z: El regreso de Broly
